title: You Start Me Up in Cooper Black
content:
Hello Stones Fans,

Mick, Keith, Charlie and Ron kick off their world tour right here in Boston today. Nope, I won’t be there to see the kickoff, but on Tuesday, we’re rockin’ at Fenway Park.

Looks like [Cooper Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20060507170312/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/cooper-black/ef-bold/testdrive.html?s=Rolling+Stones&p=36) takes front and center at the Stones’ [**_A Bigger Bang_**](http://web.archive.org/web/20060507170312/http:/www.rollingstones.com/abiggerbang/) media center.

Oddly enough, it looks like [Bodoni Roman](http://web.archive.org/web/20060507170312/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/bodoni/roman/testdrive.html?s=A+Bigger+Bang&p=48) is being used on the video title… hairlines dropping away… just like the Stones themselves!

—————————————————————  
Yes, I’m old, but I still ROCK!
author: Norbert Florendo

comments.content:
“… hairlines dropping away… “  
I know the feeling well. No moss grows on my rolling dome either :-)

ChrisL
